gaia: gaia: An R package to estimate crop yield responses to temperature and precipitation

Source: R/gaia-package.R
gaia-package.Rd

An empirical model to estimate annual crop yield responses to temperature and precipitation.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/JGCRI/gaia

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/JGCRI/gaia/issues
